result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Michael L. SKATTEBO

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
State moves to dismiss and read in these charges.   Defendant entered pleas in Case Files 14 CF 274, 15 CF 185 and 15 CF 383.   Motion granted.   
$100.00 cash bail applied to case 14 CF 274.    
Minutes.

Plea date is set for 09-24-15 at 1:15 p.m.
Minutes.
State's Motion and Demand for Discovery.

Defendant waives his right to a preliminary hearing.  Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 1 for trial.
ARRAIGNMENT - 
Information filed.  Copy served on defense counsel.
Not guilty pleas entered.  Jury calendar.
The defendant is undergoing a competency examination of other pending files and would prefer to see what happens with that before proceeding further on this case.
Status conference is set for 08-27-15 at 8:30 .am.
Waiver of Right to Preliminary Hearing.
Minutes.

ADDRESS INFO for Michael L. SKATTEBO
Current: 2319 12th Street, Two Rivers, WI 54241 United States  (Effective: 07-20-2015)
Prior: Manitowoc County Jail, Manitowoc, WI 54220 United States
At 3:17 p.m., $100.00 cash bail furnished and the defendant is released from custody.

Defendant in custody.
Defendant demands a preliminary hearing.  Preliminary hearing is set for 08-05-15 at 1:30 p.m.
Minutes.

Defendant in custody.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crimes of disorderly conduct-dvo and bail jumping.  The matters are continued for initial appearance on 07-20-15 at 2:30 p.m.  Bail is set at $100.00 cash with the conditions that he report to the Manitowoc City Police Department for fingerprints, photographs and other identifying information within 24 hours of release and have no contact with Laura Pease or her residence located at 1021 S. 23rd Street, Manitowoc, WI.   Bail not furnished and the defendant is remanded into custody.  Commitment for failure to furnish bail issued.
Minutes.
